original_text: Every time they go into the Tent of Meeting, they must wash in the same way. Then they will not die. They must also wash before they go to the altar to make a burnt offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 회막에 들어갈 때에 물로 씻어 죽기를 면할 것이요 제단에 가까이 가서 그 직분을 행하여 여호와 앞에 화제를 사를 때에도 그리 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Every time they go into the Tent of Meeting
they must wash in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 반드시 같은 방식으로 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must also wash before they go to the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제단으로 가기 전에 또한 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to make a burnt offering to the Lord
